issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: It seems, that all self created folders under the "Recources" folder are not copied to the app and further to the .ipa, when I run the app on device.
fields.summary: self created folder are not copied to device
fields.environment: iPhone 3GS, GM iOS5 and XCode 4.2 GM

comments.body:
Sebastian,

Could you please test this with the 1.7.3 SDK and the release versions of iOS5 and Xcode, and update the ticket accordingly if the issues are not solved.

Also to note, because Titanium is an open source project, we can't legally support pre release apple software due to terms in their NDA.

Best regards,
Matt
Closing resolved tickets due to inactivity.
